scripts.docker:setup: npm run docker:up && npm run setup-local-tables
scripts.setup-local-tables: npm run setup-localdb-user && npm run setup-localdb-documents
scripts.setup-localdb-user: aws dynamodb create-table --endpoint-url http://localhost:8000 --table-name users-terraform --attribute-definitions AttributeName=userName,AttributeType=S --key-schema AttributeName=userName,KeyType=HASH --billing-mode PAY_PER_REQUEST --table-class STANDARD --tags Key=Name,Value=dynamodb-table-2 Key=Environment,Value=production
scripts.setup-localdb-documents: aws dynamodb create-table --endpoint-url http://localhost:8000 --table-name documents-terraform --attribute-definitions AttributeName=documentId,AttributeType=S AttributeName=status,AttributeType=S AttributeName=createdAt,AttributeType=S --key-schema AttributeName=documentId,KeyType=HASH --global-secondary-indexes 'IndexName=status-createdAt-index,KeySchema=[{AttributeName=status,KeyType=HASH},{AttributeName=createdAt,KeyType=RANGE}],Projection={ProjectionType=ALL},ProvisionedThroughput={ReadCapacityUnits=5,WriteCapacityUnits=5}' --billing-mode PAY_PER_REQUEST --table-class STANDARD --tags Key=Name,Value=dynamodb-table-3 Key=Environment,Value=production
scripts.docker:update: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:tag && npm run docker:push
